imdb.plot outline: In the documentary series "End of the Story", the director Barak Heymann ("Bridge over the Wadi", "Dancing Alfonso") follows three divorce stories, each at a different stage of the process. The heroes of the series are Nili, Moti, Ilan and Liat, each in a different decade of life, coping with the dramatic changes impacting their families, and over the course of two years of documentation share their coping mechanisms with the whirlwind of relationships, loneliness, and love.
imdb.title: End of the Story
plot: In the documentary series "_End of the Story_ (qv)", the director Barak Heymann ("Bridge over the Wadi", "Dancing Alfonso") follows three divorce stories, each at a different stage of the process. The heroes of the series are Nili, Moti, Ilan and Liat, each in a different decade of life, coping with the dramatic changes impacting their families, and over the course of two years of documentation share their coping mechanisms with the whirlwind of relationships, loneliness, and love.::Heymann Brothers Films
